sentences: Lee Ji-young (born April 19, 1986), simply known as Lee Ji, is a South Korean actress, singer and pianoist.
Hae-in was born as Lee Ji-young on April 19, 1986 in Masan, South Gyeongsang, South Korea .
Hae-in debuted as a member of the girl group Gangkiz in 2012, their group released mini album "We Became Gang" and repackaged mini album "Mama" in the same year.
A year later, she left the group and became an actress.
